attributes.action: To Use public Tax funds for preventing global warming and planet resources abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
To Use public Tax funds for preventing global warming and planet resources abuse.

•	To prevent wasting or burning in excess any fossil fuel/natural resource which contributes to any form of global warming
•	 To prevent purposefully dumped/fly-tipped toxins, non-recyclable garbage, or recyclable goods in landfills; onto streets, or in any water supply.
•	To prevent purposefully  Manufactured goods/food packaging, that cannot be recycled and/or reused.
